name: Push-Ups on Parallettes
how_to_perform:
1. Start by placing your hands shoulder-width apart on the parallettes, with your fingers facing forward (towards your body). Engage your core and make sure your shoulders are directly over your hands.
2. From this position, lower your body down towards the ground by bending your elbows. Keep your elbows close to your body and try to keep them in a 45-degree angle or slightly more.
3. As you lower yourself, maintain proper form by keeping your entire body straight, from head to heels.
4. Once you reach the bottom of this movement, then push back up to the starting position, maintaining control throughout.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions
short_summary: Push-ups on parallettes are an exercise variation that targets the chest muscles and other upper body and core units.
